pullRequest.title: Add .editorconfig file with google-java-format compatible options
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #1126
Hopefully improved a little bit corresponding section in CONTRIBUTING.md as well.
Should we add git pre-commit hook as well into this repo? Or just add a corresponding instruction for users into CONTRIBUTING.md?

commit.message: Add .editorconfig file with google-java-format compatible options
